description: Build bảng hủy thu hộ ViettelPay
body:
INSERT INTO dbo.PaymentServices
	(
	      PaymentServiceCode
	    , PaymentServiceDate
	    , CashCollectionVendorID
	    , VendorCode
	    , ReceiptCode
	    , WarehouseCode
	    , AgreementNo
	    , CustomerCode
	    , CustomerName
	    , IDCardNo
	    , MobilePhoneNumber
	    , Amount
	    , Remark
	    , CreatedBy
	    , CreatedDateTime
	    , LastUpdatedBy
	    , LastUpdatedDateTime
	    , PaymentServiceStatus
	    , CreatedEmployeeBy
	    , LastUpdatedEmployeeBy
	    , Status
	    , RefInvoiceCode
	    , IsConfirmed
	    , ConfirmedDate
	    , ConfirmedEmployeeBy
	    , Notes
	    , CashCollectionNoVATUserCreate
	    , POSIsPushed
	    , POSPayReceipt
	    , ReasonCancel
	)
SELECT
        'PC-VTPay-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, P.ID)
	, P.CreateDate
	, CASE WHEN P.Pay_Type = 1 THEN 49 WHEN P.Pay_Type = 3 THEN 41 END
	, CASE WHEN P.Pay_Type = 1 THEN '0049' WHEN P.Pay_Type = 3 THEN '0041' END
	, CONVERT(VARCHAR, P.ID)
	, P.From_ShopCode
	, CONVERT(VARCHAR, P.ID)
	, P.U_Phone_Sender
	, P.CardName_Sender
	, ''
	, P.U_Phone_Sender
	, -(P.U_Tmoney + (CASE WHEN P.isReturnFee = 1 THEN P.U_Fee ELSE 0 END))
	, 'system'
	, ISNULL(P.UpdateBy, P.Createby)
	, GETDATE()
	, ISNULL(P.UpdateBy, P.Createby)
	, NULL
	, 100
	, P.Createby
	, P.UpdateBy
	, 1
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, NULL
FROM
    dbo.Pay_Services P (NOLOCK)
WHERE
    P.ID IN ($CURSOR$)
    AND P.Pay_Type IN (1, 3)
